[\[282a.2\]]kun las sgrol byed pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dang /_/las tshogs thams cad myur du grub mdzad ma/_/phrin las thams cad yongs su grub byed pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom
[\[282a.3\]]rkun dang /_/lcags sgrog chu dang bgegs dang 'jigs pa brgyad/_/'jigs pa kun las yongs su sgrol byed pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/gdon dang rims dang smyo 'bog la sogs dang /_/gnod byed la sogs dus min 'chi bas skrag_/sdug bsngal thams cad rab
[\[282a.4\]]tu zhi byed pa'i/_/yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/skye bo sngon bsags las dang nyon mongs kyi/_/mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu sogs sdig_/sdig pa'i las rnams bdag gis ci bsags pa/_/de dag thams cad ma lus byang bar shog_/bdag ni da ltar skye ba 'di la yang /_/
[\[282a.5\]]rmi ngan mtshan ngan 'chi ltas dus min skrag_/bkra mi shis pa thams cad dag gyur nas/_/tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod rgyas par shog_/bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du/_/yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub la sogs pa/_/las tshogs
[\[282a.6\]]thams cad yid bzhin grub par shog_/yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje che ldan pa/_/bdag gis rab tu brtse ba'i gdung sems kyis/_/bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang bsags des/_/yi dam sgrol ma lha dang mi 'bral shog_/'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa phrin las thams cad
[\[282a.7\]]sgrub pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D3670}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tA rA de bI sto tra puSh+pa mA li nA ma/_bod skad du/_'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa me tog phreng ba zhes bya ba/_mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan

[\[282b.1\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la gzigs pa'i/_/zhabs kyi pad+mo la ni btud de/_/tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir du/_/lhag pa'i lha la bstod par bya'o/_/phyag 'tshal sgrol ma lha yi lha khyod/_/dngos grub ma lus kun
[\[282b.2\]]gyi 'byung gnas/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin po che ltar/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar mdzad ma/_/phyag 'tshal ngo mtshar khyad du 'phags pa'i/_/yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i sku la/_/ye shes lnga yi rang mdangs rgyas pas/_/thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro ma/_/phyag 'tshal
[\[282b.3\]]chu bzhi'i pha rol legs gnas/_/las dang nyon mongs srid las rnam grol/_/sangs rgyas yon tan phyir mi ldog pa'i/_/sa lam ma lus mtha' ru phyin ma/_/phyag 'tshal srid pa'i dra ba 'joms mdzad/_/thugs kyi snying po yi ge bcu pas/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang
[\[282b.4\]]mngon spyod/_/phrin las 'od kyis nam mkha' gang ma/_/phyag 'tshal 'gro ba'i skyabs mchog sgrol ma/_/bud med gzugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad/_/dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug sras mo/_/'phags pa'i spyan chab las ni 'khrungs ma/_/phyag 'tshal 'gran zla med
[\[282b.5\]]pa'i sku mchog_/zag med bde rgyas zla ba'i gdan la/_/bzhugs pa'i zhabs kyi pad+mo la ni/_/lha dang lha min cod pan gtugs ma/_/phyag 'tshal che ba'i nang na che mchog_/'byung po ro langs ma rungs tshogs 'joms/_/gzhan gyis mi thub drag rtsal chen mo/_/stobs chen
[\[282b.6\]]pha rol gnon par mdzad ma/_/phyag 'tshal sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi zhabs la/_/skyabs pa'i mi de mya ngan 'das thob/_/mchog gi don chen 'grub par mdzad ma/_/phyag 'tshal seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma/_/rigs drug bur 'dzin brtse ba'i thugs kyi/_/

[\[283a.1\]]dpa' mo rdo rje sgrol ma/_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can/_/rdo rje la sogs phyag mtshan brgyad kyis/_/phrin las rnams kyi 'gro don mdzad ma/_/phyag 'tshal skye 'gro rnams la dbang sgyur/_/'jig rten gsum na mthu rtsal ldan pa'i/_/dregs pas myos pa rnams kyi

[\[283a.5\]]can rnams kyi rgyud la/_/ma rig sgo nga'i mun rum sel ma/_/phyag 'tshal ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid/_/dpal ldan dri ma med pa'i sku la/_/mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras ma/_/phyag 'tshal khams gsum dbang du sdud ma/_/tshangs pa khyab

[\[283b.1\]]'gro la gzigs ma/_/phyag 'tshal stong nyid snying rje'i lcags kyus/_/'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'gro ba 'dren mdzad/_/shul nor 'phrang la thugs rjes bzung nas/_/thar pa'i lam la khrid par mdzad pa/_/phyag 'tshal bdud bzhi 'joms par mdzad ma/_/sangs rgyas kun dngos rje btsun ma khyod/_/

[\[345a.1\]]can ma/_/khyod la phyag 'tshal brtse bas bdag blo'i mi shes mun pa myur du sol/_/rab tu snyan pa'i dbyangs ldan dri za'i bu mo rab mdzes yid 'phrog ma/_/lag gi 'du byed rab tu bsgyur bas tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs rnam 'byung bas/_/sgra
